DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study obtain safety information use sitagliptin phosphate/metformin hydrochloride ( HCl ) ( JANUMET® ) endocrinologists , diabetologists , internist , general practitioner .

DOC.criteria: Must take sitagliptin phosphate/metformin HCl ( JANUMET® ) treatment type 2 diabetes mellitus Treating physician must agree provide information regard participant 's treatment
